    • Constructor Detail

      • Monster

        public Monster(java.lang.String type,
               float hp,
               float speed,
               float armour,
               float manaGainedOnKill,
               int quantity,
               processing.core.PImage monsterImage,
               float PositionX,
               float PositionY)
        Contain informations of monster
        Parameters:
        type - the type of monster it pass in, germelin, worm or beetle
        hp - total amount of hp
        speed - speed of the monster
        armour - monster's armour
        manaGainedOnKill - amount of mana will gain when the monster is been killed
        quantity - amount of that type monster in the current wave
        monsterImage - monster image that will be display
        PositionX - monster's position x
        PositionY - monster's position y

      • deathAnimation

        public boolean deathAnimation(processing.core.PImage[] monsterImages)
        display death animation of germelin when it dead
        Parameters:
        monsterImages - all monster images involves beetle, worm gremelin and their freeze images
        Returns:
        the boolean expression to know when monster die. The monster been removed when all death animation been displayed

      • update

        public void update(java.util.List<java.lang.String> path,
                   ActionButton DoubleTime,
                   ActionButton pause)
        loop through monster direction list that's generate by using bfs. The index is used to loop through the list, it will increase when countTo32 greate or equal to 32 pixel
        Parameters:
        path - list of directions, up , down, left and right
        DoubleTime - to check if the double time button is set to yellow
        pause - to check if pause button is set to yellow

      • freezeTime

        public void freezeTime(float frameRate)
        when the monster is freeze, start the freeze count time
        Parameters:
        frameRate - the framerate is use to add iceCount very frame
